/* ================================================================================ * EXTENSION: HcmGoal_ColorCodeByStatus_Extension * MODULE: Human Resources > Performance Management * FORM: HcmGoal (Goals) * PURPOSE: Applies color coding to goals based on their status for visual tracking * * VISUAL REPRESENTATION: * * Goals List with Color Coding: * ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────┐ * │ ███████████████████████████████████████████ │ * │ Goal Description | Status | Due │ * │ ███████████████████████████████████████████ │ * │ 🟢 Complete Project X | Completed | Jan │ [Light Green] * │ 🟢 Train Team Members | On Track | Feb │ [Light Green] * │ 🟠 Improve KPIs | Needs Impr. | Mar │ [Light Orange] * │ 🟡 New Initiative | Not Started | Apr │ [Light Yellow] * └─────────────────────────────────────────────┘ * * COLOR SCHEME: * Status | Color | RGB | Meaning * ────────────────────┼───────────────┼────────────────┼────────────────── * Completed | Light Green | (144, 238, 144)| Success/Achieved * OnTrack | Light Green | (144, 238, 144)| Progressing Well * NeedsImprovement | Light Orange | (255, 165, 0) | Requires Attention * NotStarted | Light Yellow | (255, 255, 224)| Action Needed * * TESTING: * To verify this functionality: * 1. Navigate to: Human resources > Performance > Goals * 2. View the goals list - records will be colored based on status * 3. Using Contoso data: You should see goals with different colors * * BUSINESS VALUE: * - Enables quick visual status assessment of all goals * - Improves user experience with intuitive color coding * - Facilitates faster decision-making and prioritization * - Enhances performance tracking visibility ================================================================================ */
[ExtensionOf(formDataSourceStr(HcmGoal, HcmGoal))] final class HcmGoal_ColorCodeByStatus_Extension { }
